long_description: founded in taiwan in 1978, we transferred operations to xiamen in 1990; as such, we were one of the earliest foreign-invested eyewear manufacturers in china, contributing to the local industry and economic development. in the past decade, we have kept expanding production lines and capacity. haicang factory was inaugurated in 2009. our company focuses on the r&d, production, marketing and servicing of various eyeglass categories with all sorts of material, including sunglasses, optical frames, sports glasses, children's glasses, reading glasses, safety glasses and lenses. our business focuses on two main areas: product production and brand management. we provide oem and odm services to global brands; our products are marketed throughout the world. our brand portfolio includes both self-owned and licensed brands; they are parim, outdo, polaroid eyewear, pilkington, santa barbara polo & racquet club, arnold palmer, dr.
business_tags: optical glasses | optical frames | sports glasses | safety glass | reading glass | black | white | economic development | job announcement | r&d products | brand management | licensed brands
generated_description: parim, legally known as chengyi international co. limited, is a well-established eyewear manufacturer founded in taiwan in 1978. the company transferred its operations to xiamen, china, in 1990, becoming one of the earliest foreign-invested eyewear manufacturers in the region. parim focuses on the research and development, production, marketing, and servicing of various eyeglass categories, including sunglasses, optical frames, sports glasses, children's glasses, reading glasses, and safety glasses. the company provides oem and odm services to global brands and manages a diverse portfolio of both self-owned and licensed brands.
generated_business_tags: safety glasses manufacturer | oem/odm services | childrens glasses manufacturer | eyewear manufacturing | brand management | production | reading glasses retailer | sports glasses
